entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
